snippet.title: Ephemeral dreams, Eternal love -Yaoi-
snippet.description:
We released a new game.
【GooglePlay】
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.favary.fvtl.pro
【AppStore】
https://itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewSoftware?id=1364289565&mt=8

Set in Edo Period Japan.
Deep in Yoshiwara, where many men and women’s hearts are singed by transient love, lies the male-only brothel “Peony House.”
Is seeing an escort, whose glamor women fall for and whose strength men admire, a one-night-only dream, or perhaps――?

▼ Gameplay Instruction
Advancing is easy. Simply by tapping the screen, you can enjoy thise man-on-man romance.

▼ Recommended for these users
We recommend this game to the following people.
・People who enjoy “Boy’s Love games.”
・People who enjoy man-on-man love stories.
